DOC.brief_summary: This is a extension study of CSTI571B1201 study
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Clinical Study of Imatinib Mesylate in Patients With Malignant Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumors (Extension Study)
DOC.criteria: Patients who completed the CSTI571B1201 study Other protocoldefined inclusion / exclusion criteria may apply.
